pullRequest.title: #19347 ~10x faster
pullRequest.bodyText:
Performance is roughly 10 requests per second vs. 1 request per second.
Has a feature flag to disable behavior

nodes.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Avoid declaring a variable if it is unreferenced before a possible exit point.
